sorry I expected to mug the bum and the drunk and be done with it, I wasn't
expecting the cavalry to arrive so quickly. (Enters stareing contest with
rauq) grrrrrrr.

(if you would have fought together instead of going one-two on one the
Cybrats would've been scrapped sooner.
----- Original Message -----
From: rAuq <rauq@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2001 10:14 PM
Subject: The Ikoto


> OOC: I was trying to get the Autobots off the planet, but things
> didn't go smoothly as planned. *glares at Cyberwolf* =P hehe
>
> --- Azafroth / Ikoto / Pacifix ---
>
> Azafroth watches with happenings at the Autobot hide out with
> distaste. His translucent body shimmers as he decides to speed
> up the process. He projects his thoughts to Pacifix, implanting a
> thought into his head. << There is an enemy outside your ship, and
> he is threatening to kill Commander Ironhide! I should save the
> Commander. >> Azafroth shimmers even more brightly as he
> observes his work in progress.
>
> Pacifix suddenly turns and spots a bot close to Ironhide. A though
> races through his head, <<There is an enemy outside your ship,
> and he is threatening to kill Commander Ironhide! I should save the
> Commander.>> He runs towards the bot, and to the side, making
> sure that there is nobody in his line of fire. His twin autocannons
> begin firing in bursts of eight, and his arm freeze cannons launch
> eight freeze blasts in total all directed at the bot near Ironhide, Arty.
>
>
>
>

>
>
